events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position. The candidate's resume shows strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate’s background matches the software development requirements and devops experience needed for this role.
Assigned Recruiter Jane Doe to this candidate to ensure a smooth communication process and to coordinate the next steps of the technical recruitment workflow.
Conducted a phone screening with the candidate focusing on their software engineering experience, proficiency in coding languages, and familiarity with devops tools.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview and deeper discussion about the engineering team’s projects.
Scheduled a technical interview with the lead software developer for next week to assess the candidate’s coding skills and devops knowledge in a practical setting.
